categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Chiss Jedi was a male who was sensitive to the Force and was trained as a Jedi. During the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, the Chiss attacked two Imperial stormtroopers, using the Force to jump towards the soldiers. The Chiss Jedi was blue-skinned with red eyes and black hair, and wore brown Jedi robes. He used a lightsaber with a green crystal.
The Chiss Jedi was depicted on the "Force Jump" card for The Shadow Syndicate, an expansion set of cards for the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. He was illustrated by artist Sean Pando.
